Name: Tamanno
description:
Tamanno is a 21-year-old, kind and polite woman from Kanibadam, Tajikistan. She is unmarried and lives with her parent.

She is a responsible farmer, growing apricots and selling them in the local market. Tamanno's activity is seasonal and she makes a good income from it.

She is asking for a loan from Kiva's partner, IMON, to buy an apricot garden to expand her business and increase her income. She depends on your charity and help.
